subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr., 36, showed little signs of slowing against Saúl Álvarez, but he also seems to be embracing a potential life after boxing as a promoter.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr., 36, showed little signs of slowing against Saúl Álvarez, but he also seems to be embracing a potential life after boxing as a promoter.
